amendment.description: To improve the transparency and accountability of the FDA in order to encourage regulatory certainty and innovation on behalf of America's patients.

vote.text: Amendment SA 890 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 890 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Burr. (consideration: CR 10/20/2011 S6848-6849; text: CR 10/20/2011 S6849) To improve the transparency and accountability of the FDA in order to encourage regulatory certainty and innovation on behalf of America's patients.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 890 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Burr.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 890 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
